projects.heading: My Portfolio
projects.description: A static website for sharing my personal projects. Built using React, Vite, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Deployed on AWS S3 using Terraform.

projects.heading: Campfire CLI
projects.subHeading: Create a campfire in your terminal.
projects.description: A (command-line tool) CLI that lets you create a campfire (with optional campfire soundscapes) in your terminal. Built using Python and Typer.

projects.heading: Connect Four
projects.subHeading: A Connect Four implementation in TypeScript.
projects.description: A Connect Four implementation in TypeScript for local gameplay.

projects.heading: Lorem INTL
projects.subHeading: Quickly add Lorem Ipsum text in multiple languages.
projects.description: An NPM package that lets you quickly add Lorem Ipsum text in multiple languages for testing and prototyping.

projects.heading: Songbook
projects.subHeading: A platform for sharing your favorite songs.
projects.description: A full-stack web app where users can listen to songs and share their favorite tracks for future visitors. Built using Next.js, Express, React, Zod, and MongoDB.
